title: r/Maliciouscompliance How I Got Revenge on a Rich A-Hole
description:
r/Maliciouscompliance In today's video, a rich snob at a country club gets pissed off that a waiter keeps interrupting him (even though the waiter is just following the rules). So, when the rich a-hole snaps and screams at the waiter to stop bothering him, the waiter enacts some malicious compliance and lets the rich guy's son build up a huge, vomit-inducing tab at the restaurant!

Watch on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GDIgfwLX8As
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
